setting.title: View Fimforwardcontract
setting.columnlabels: Import Order/ Invoice No.,Bank,Currency,Bank Booking Ref No.,Booking Date,Forward Booking Amount,Utilisation Amount,Cancellation Amount,Forward Balance Amount,Forward Booking Rate,From Date,To Date,Spot rate - Booking Date,Spot Rate on Utilisation Date,Spot Rate on Cancellation Date,Utilisation Rate,Profit and Loss on Utilisation,Cancellation Rate,Profit and Loss on Cancellation,Total Profit and Loss on Forward Contract,Invoice No.,Remark,Trade Credit Bank Ref No.,Client Id,fimtradecreditid
setting.query:
select $COLUMNS$ from tbl_fimforwardcontract
LEFT JOIN tbl_fimimportorder ON fimimportorder_fimimportorderid=fimforwardcontract_fimimportorderid LEFT JOIN tbl_bank ON bank_bankid=fimforwardcontract_bankid LEFT JOIN tbl_exposurecurrencymaster ON exposurecurrencymaster_exposurecurrencymasterid=fimforwardcontract_exposurecurrencymasterid $Search$
setting.searchbylabels: Booking Date,Forward Booking Amount,Forward Balance Amount,Forward Booking Rate,Total Profit and Loss on Forward Contract
